#summary Eclipse projects listed in trunk

= GWT Example Projects =

 == Installation Notes ==
 * After project import, change the referenced gwt-linux/gwt-user.jar location if yours isn't /opt/gwt-linux/gwt-user.jar
 * You may have to add a mysql jdbc connector jar. 
 * Check my [gwt-examples] for more eclipse tips and info.

 # *TomcatWarBuilder*
 # *Clicklistener* on Widget Example
 # *DisplayDate* - date and time examples
 # *Login Manager*
 # *MySQL Connection* - Query Examples
 # *Object Reference* - pass around widgets
 # *RPC Example Basic*
 # *RPC Example2* - More Advanced rpc passing an object
